# Problem 1

### Loading the p8105_mtp_data.xlsx data set and cleaning the data set 
```{r}
naturer_df <-
  read_excel(
    "./data/p8105_mtp_data.xlsx",
    sheet = "this one",
    range = "A9:I1230") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
```


### replacing numerical codes with actual data information
```{r}
naturer_dfc <- 
  naturer_df %>%
  mutate(
    sex = recode(sex, "0" = "Female", "1" = "Male"),
    age_group = recode(age_group,
                       "1" = ">18",
                       "2" = "18-30", 
                       "3" = "31-40", 
                       "4" = "41-50",
                       "5" = "51-60", 
                       "6" = "60+",
                       "7" = "60+", 
                       "8" = "60+"), 
    eop_size_mm = replace(eop_size_mm, is.na(eop_size_mm), "0"),
    eop_size = recode(eop_size,
                      "0" = "0-5",
                      "1" = "5-10",
                      "2" = "10-15",
                      "3" = "15-20",
                      "4" = "20=25",
                      "5" = "25+"
                      ),
    fhp_category = recode(fhp_category,
                          "0" = "0-10",
                          "1" = "10-20",
                          "2" = "20-30",
                          "3" = "30-40",
                          "4" = "40-50",
                          "5" = "50-60",
                          "6" = "60-70",
                          "7" = "70-80"),
    eop_visibility_classification = recode(eop_visibility_classification,
                                           "0" = "eop size 0 mm",
                                           "1" = "0 < eop size mm <= 5",
                                           "2" = "eop size >= 5 mm")
    )

naturer_dfc
```
